version_description:
Get ready for an awesome update!

* Minimap! - Confused about where you were? Not anymore!
* Redesigned UI - Had trouble with the controls? We've redesigned the UI to make it a lot easier to use!
* Crashes - we all hate these. Should be less now.
* Max rooms - increased to 500, so you don't have to wait for one.

Love the update? Please leave us a good review and email nathan@appholdings.org to give him your support. He worked very hard on this update to bring you some things you love!

**IMPORTANT: MAKE SURE TO UPDATE TO SEE GAMES IN MULTIPLAYER LOBBY**

- Major optimizations for graphics and physics
- Smarter Zombies!
- Guns have more unique characteristics
- Boat your way around the Islands!
- Hunt animals!
- And loads, loads more...!

If you love the update, please give us a good review and email nathan@appholdings.org to show some support! He worked very hard to bring you this update!

**IMPORTANT: MAKE SURE TO UPDATE TO SEE GAMES IN MULTIPLAYER LOBBY**

- Major optimizations for graphics and physics
- Smarter Zombies!
- Guns have more unique characteristics
- Boat your way around the Islands!
- Hunt animals!
- And loads, loads more...!
- Bug fixes

If you love the update, please give us a good review and email nathan@appholdings.org to show some support! He worked very hard to bring you this update!

**IMPORTANT: Makes sure to update to see games in lobby. Players on older version will no longer see games.**

- You asked for it - we've given you a new Energy / Hunger system - now survival is not just about shooting!
- Guns have had their properties tweaked even more - AUTOMATIC fire is here for AK47 and M4 users!
- Usual frenzy of bug fixing!

Love the update? Please leave us a good rating and review! And email nathan@appholdings.org any positive comments :) He'll be happy to hear from you
- Fix for in-game voice chat related crashes

- Game synchronization fixes
- Energy system tweaks

- Improved inventory system supporting extra bags
- Animals can now be hunted for food
- Other minor fixes

If you like the update, pleae give us a review and email nathan@appholdings.org with some positive support :)

- CRAFTING system is now being introduced to the game! Collect resources and cook your food! 
- Fixed bugs regarding additional bag slots
- More optimizations!

Stay tuned for more great updates!

- The beginnings of our crafting system has been added!
- More optimizations

If you like the update, please give us a good review and email nathan@appholdings.org some positive support!

**IMPORTANT** Please make sure to update to see rooms.

Fixes to in app analytics.

ZOMBIE remake! The zombies have undergone evolution and are smarter and faster. BEWARE!
Added ARMOUR rating to clothing! Statistics in your inventory screen show this.
Loads of fixes and optimizations as usual!

Please give us a good review and send your support to nathan@appholdings.org :) He has worked hard on this update.

- Expanded on Crafting System
- Improvements to high-quality water rendering
- Map changes to add resources for crafting
- Map changes to make deep water dangerous

- Updated supporting libraries
- Reorganization and optimization of game in preparation for further updates
- Reworked shop system

- Fixed sniper scopes being unresponsive
- Improved melee weapon damage
- Added adjustable control positions

- Fixed sniper scopes being unresponsive
- Improved melee weapon damage
- Added adjustable control positions
